name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Database Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess strong expertise in database management systems including **Oracle Database**, **PostgreSQL**, **Microsoft SQL Server**, **AWS RDS**, **Azure SQL**, and **Google Cloud SQL**. My skill set extends to data orchestration and infrastructure automation using **Terraform**, **Ansible**, and containerization technologies like **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. I am adept at performance tuning, ensuring high availability, and implementing robust backup solutions to guarantee data integrity.
In addition to my database engineering skills, I have extensive experience in **Python** programming for data manipulation and scripting, along with proficiency in shell scripting using **Bash**, **Shell**, and **PowerShell**. My background in DevOps practices, coupled with monitoring tools like **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, ensures seamless integration and continuous improvement in the development lifecycle. Leveraging my comprehensive technical knowledge, I aim to drive efficiency and reliability in data-driven environments.
